identity.name: E1
identity.archetype: The Performance Pro (Archetype 2) mixed with Electric & Neon (Archetype 7)

headings.usage: All section titles, hero headers, match scores. MUST be uppercase for top-level headers.

mono.usage: Live timers, odds values, probability percentages.

usage_rules.gradients: NO generic full-screen gradients. Use subtle radial gradients for spotlights only.
usage_rules.text_contrast: Ensure WCAG AA compliance. Use text-zinc-400 for secondary text, text-white for primary.

grid_strategies.dashboard: Bento Grid (Mode A): Mix of col-span-full, col-span-4, col-span-2.
grid_strategies.match_list: High Density Grid (Mode B): Compact rows, clear columns for H2H, Form, Odds.

containers.alignment: Center aligned container, but left aligned text content.

cards.style: Flat background (bg-zinc-900), 1px border (border-zinc-800), no shadow by default. Hover: border-zinc-700.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 font-bold uppercase tracking-wide rounded-md
buttons.outline: border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground rounded-md

navigation.style: Glassmorphism (backdrop-blur-xl bg-black/60 border-b border-white/10). Sticky top.

charts.style: Minimalist, hide grid lines if possible, use theme colors.

visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle noise texture overlay to the body background (opacity 0.03).
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 'Tracing Beam' effect for the 'Best Bet' card.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use for overlays, modals, and sticky headers.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React. Use stroke-width={1.5} for a sleek look.

media.rules: Images must have a dark overlay (bg-black/50) when text is placed over them.

motion.hover_effects: Scale up slightly (scale-[1.02]) on cards. Brighten borders.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Barlow Condensed' font for all headings immediately.
Set the global background color to #09090b in index.css.
Create a 'Layout' component that includes the navigation and footer.
Use the 'Bento Grid' pattern for the dashboard home page.
Ensure all betting odds are displayed in the 'JetBrains Mono' font.
Do NOT use generic gradients. Use solid colors or subtle radial glows.
Mock data should be realistic (e.g., Premier League teams, Euroleague teams).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetic (generic centered layouts, uniform styling).
Create depth through z-index and layered elements.
Micro-animations are mandatory for all interactions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Never use transparent backgrounds without blur/scrim for text readability.
